org.dellroad.stuff.dao

Class CriteriaCallback<T,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dellroad.stuff.dao.QueryCallback<R>
      • org.dellroad.stuff.dao.TypedQueryCallback<T,R>
        • org.dellroad.stuff.dao.CriteriaCallback<T,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - query result type, i.e., what the CriteriaQuery returns zero or more of
    R - query Java return type, usually either R or List<R>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractDAO.DAOCriteriaListCallback, AbstractDAO.DAOCriteriaUniqueCallback

    public abstract class CriteriaCallback<T,R>
extends TypedQueryCallback<T,R>
    Specialization of QueryCallback for CriteriaQuery queries.
